original_text: So make a ship for yourself. Use wood from cypress trees to make it. The ship must have rooms in it. Cover the inside and the outside of the ship with tar.
korean_text: 너는 고페르 나무로 너를 위하여 방주를 만들되 그 안에 칸들을 막고 역청을 그 안팎에 칠하라

sentences.original_text: So make a ship for yourself.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 너 자신을 위한 배를 만드라.

sentences.original_text: Use wood from cypress trees to make it.
The ship must have rooms in it.
Cover the inside of the ship with tar.
Cover the outside of the ship with tar.
